title: I am absolutely gutted for Wales - we were beaten at our own game by South Africa
text:
That was a bitterly disappointing end to a World Cup campaign in which Wales have shown real resilience. They have been a defence-orientated team, a gritty side who can hang around in games and then take their chances. But that was not enough to defeat South Africa.

It was two teams arguably playing the most risk-averse rugby in the tournament. They did not want to change their formula. Both teams’ defences have been so dominant throughout this tournament that they did not want to play into each other’s hands. We saw two teams playing exactly the same suffocating brand of rugby.

You try to control the breakdown, hope the ball bounces your way, kick your goals, look for scrum penalties. Wales...
description: That was a bitterly disappointing end to a World Cup campaign in which Wales have shown real resilience.
